criteria: Accuracy and readability of OCR-cleaned text compared to the original reference.

score_rubric.0: Completely incorrect or nonsensical output. Unreadable.
score_rubric.1: Severely flawed. Many major errors, barely understandable.
score_rubric.3: Understandable, but several minor issues or few major flaws.
score_rubric.4: Great, with just small defects (e.g., punctuation or casing or rare misspellings).
score_rubric.5: Perfect. Fully correct and matches the reference text exactly.
